name: Delicioso - Tranquilo 40 Tin - Whisky
additionalNotes: A wonderful addition to the Delicioso family is the Tranquilo 40 tin. It is a handmade small cigar wrapped in a Connecticut or Dominican Maduro Special wrapper. Tranquilo is mild and creamy and available in 7 flavors. Choose from Pina Colada, Rum and Whisky in Connecticut wrapper or Black Forest Cherry, Blue Sea Blueberry, French Cognac and Green Label Mint in DMS Wrapper.
